name: Crazy Car (Algebro)
description:
Game made in 6 hours.

3D Assets by Poylgon packs by Synty  https://syntystore.com/collections/frontpage)

Movement with WASD.

It's a game idea that I'd like to go deeper into, add more obstacles and decoration even if it's just to have a small demo, so I might upload 8, 10 or 12 hour development versions in the future.

I also contemplate the possibility of adding a virtual joystick and exporting it for mobile devices.
